name: Kaitlyn Nicole
text: I mean, the food is okay. But when I sit in a booth I would prefer them to be clean. I glanced down the side of the booth and itâ€™s a complete mess! Pieces of ceiling, dipping cups, food, etc. gross! Holes in the tiles, tables are sticky, ceiling is disgusting. I donâ€™t trust eating food from here anymore.

name: Lovee Columbus
text: Haven't eaten there in ages. It was really good pizza! My friend and I appreciate their patience with us while we sat and gabbed for quite a while after we gobbled the delicious pizza.

name: James Spivey
text: Uhhh guess we should have said medium rare pizza

name: Jon w
text: Clean Good fresh food excellent hometown service. Great place

name: Leola Travis
text: Not the best place to get pizza in town. It's ok but not great. Hut rewards are nice but improvements on this store could definitely be made. We've not dined in in a while to speak on the atmosphere but the staff has always been friendly over the phone and through delivery. They often don't have a delivery driver when we order.

name: Adam Melton
text: I place an order online for delivery like i have several times. i get a call from the pizza hut and they say they are not doing delivery tonight.... so you offer delivery and you dont deliver. place needs a management check.

name: Sheila Henson
text: Perfect! Toppings Perfect! Really cheesy! Really nice people!

name: Troy McGahan
text: Barb is awesomeness personified to the power of infinite. Her awesome staff does a wonderful job of serving deliciousness in a pizza pan. Everyone from the cook's to delivery are 10 stars out of 5!!! High five Pizza Hut of Marion, Ky you deserve it!!!

name: Kelly Colwell
text: The salad bar consists of brown lettuce, pickles, croutons, and not much else. Oh, they have loads of dressings,  but not much to pour them on.

name: Heath Martin
text: Didn't have enough people.  Took a long time to get our food.  The worker was very nice and worked hard though.

name: Rian Lewis
text: Love my man B-rice and my homegirl Jennifer. They really know how to make some good pizza and stuff. The other workers are cool, too, but gotta give some love to my homies. Real talk, though, the pizza, wings, and cheese sticks are really good. Everyone there is good at their jobs.

name: Allison Tramel
text: Service is ok pizza is great

name: Koen Zomers
text: Cheap pizza buffet for lunch. Only about 5$ when taken with tap water. Pizza is quite good but they're really slow on restocking the  buffet. Lettuce looked old and brown. Staff is  a bit mediocre, could be more friendly. Hate that there â€¦More

name: Gabba SLAER
text: Nice friendly employees food is always ready when they say it will b done

name: Jw Williamson
text: You all should make chicken bacon ranch pizza.

name: Ben Beachy
text: Restaurant had no silverware and when notified they explained they needed to go next door to get it and took a while to do so. The tomatoes, spinach, and banana peppers at the salad bar were basically inedible, tasted like it had been out â€¦More

text: Don't know why we occasionally give this place another try. The service is always terrible and never seem to care if you have a nice experience.

text: The pizza's were a little to crispy but they were still good and the garlic knots were good to, the service was a little slow but the waitress was very nice.

name: fraction40
text: Nice buffet. An easy inexpensive experience with good service and friendly staff.

name: Cary Cowan

name: Rebecca Zahrte
text: Meh.... It is an okay stop for a quick lunch buffet.  However, the service isn't always great, the decor is extremely dated and no matter how hard they clean, it's never going to look clean.  It's an alright place to eat, not my first choice however.
